The Banner Open

County Clare Golfing Experience


Learn More

Ireland's Premier Golf Endurance Experience

Team members are restricted from consuming their competition beverage until both team members first drives have left the first tee. Each team begins with a 20 drink-shot handicap, each shot equivalent to a 500 ml can at a minimum of 4% alcohol content.

Combinging the skill of Augusta National with the drinking of a leaving cert holiday in Santa Ponsa.

The Old Head of Kinsale, Adare Manor, The K Club, Lahinch. The Banner Open continues a long and storied tradition of incredible golfing in Ireland.

"The quality on display is absolutely phenomenal, the way those men consume their cans is inspirational" - Rory McIlroy

Rules

18 Holes

Idyllic holes set with the backdrop of county Clare in a pristine Parkland course.

20 Cans

Can of your choosing, minimum 4%. Consumed between team members

Teams of Two

A combined handicap of the players. Will be provided with scorecard and polo featuring the logo on the day.

Leaderboard

Vpar will be used for a live leaderboard. Follow us on social media with #banneropen, snapchat filter available on the day.

Augusta meets Shannon
